name: unmute
description: Unmute a user in the server.
code:
$suppressErrors
$deletecommand
$if[$isBot[$mentioned[1]]==true;{delete:1}{description:You cannot unmute a bot!}{color:RED}]
$if[$isUser [$mentioned[1]]==false;{delete:1}{description:User  not found!}{color:RED}]
$unmute[$mentioned[1]]
$embed[{title:User  Unmuted}{description:$username[$mentioned[1]] has been unmuted!}{color:GREEN}]
